question: ‘Dharani’ portal, which was seen in news, was launched by which state government?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Telangana Chandrasekhar Rao announced that registration of non-agricultural lands and properties will be commenced through 'Dharani’ portal.
It is an integrated land record management system portal, launched in the month of October. It has records related to around 1.46 crore acres of land. Originally, only agricultural lands were registered through Dharani portal.
